title: Paying Dad's Italian Debt
description: When a vacation with her friend turns sinister, Clara Eldridge is left all alone in Naples, Italy. But little does she know, her father owes a big debt, and her little trip has landed her right on the doorstep of the man he owes it to. When possessive, dangerous Cosimo becomes her unlikely hero, will Clara be able to find a way to help pay her daddy’s debts?One look at Clara and Cosimo Giordano couldn’t care less about the money her father owed anymore. No, all he wants now is Clara herself, and every bit of her innocence, too. He trades her father’s debt for just two weeks of her time, knowing that her body wants him, even if her heart is still catching up. Cosimo will protect Clara, even it leads to murder, but will he be able to earn her love at the same time?
author: Lena Little
